Instruction: Peel the bananas and mash them in a mixing bowl.
Add eggs, rolled oats, and cinnamon to the mashed bananas.
Stir until well combined to form a batter.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter onto the skillet for each pancake.
Cook for 2-3 minutes, or until bubbles form on the surface.
Flip the pancakes and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes on the other side.
Serve warm with your favorite toppings, such as maple syrup or fresh berries.
